message: Since symfony/framework-bundle 5.1: Not setting the "framework.router.utf8" configuration option is deprecated, it will default to "true" in version 6.0.
Since symfony/framework-bundle 6.1: Not setting the "framework.http_method_override" config option is deprecated. It will default to "false" in 7.0.
Since symfony/framework-bundle 6.4: Not setting the "framework.handle_all_throwables" config option is deprecated. It will default to "true" in 7.0.
Since symfony/framework-bundle 6.4: Not setting the "framework.php_errors.log" config option is deprecated. It will default to "true" in 7.0.
